title: Client update error
body:
Theres this problem im getting when updating client, it says theres an error and returns scanning process to 1 and it does over and over again. I've heard sometimes changing to other region fixes it but it doesn't work for me and "repair" client doesn't work for me anymore, but it used to work before.
Re-installing helps but i have to let it update for hour or two which makes no sense...

replies.body: It sounds like your patch to the updated client may not have gone to well.  In this case, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)may be needed to return things to order.  You can select to update again to the testing version from there.  Hope that helps!

Thats another problem. I have to reinstall game after every patch and waiting few hours for client to update is not so simple.
Im not sure whats the issue but i already reinstalled LoL twice because this happened one month back and now i have to do it again. I wish there was easier solution.

Edit: Could changing to client beta help anything?

Having to reinstall every patch definitely sounds like something's wrong.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get some more context and help you individually.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs in your ticket.  Our tech team will respond back to you asap!
